PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07892010-06-17FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectElectronic Filing and Provision of Information (GST/HST) Regulations (Special Edition-2010-06-30)
PrecisELECTRONIC FILING AND PROVISION OF INFORMATION (GST/HST) REGULATIONS to properly capture certain Goods and Services Tax/Harmonized Sales Tax (GST/HST) information required for the proper allocation of HST revenues among the federal government and the participating provinces that entered into a modernized Comprehensive Integrated Tax Co-ordination Agreement (CITCA) with Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0150 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Electronic Filing and Provision of Information (GST/HST) Regulations (Special Edition-2010-06-30)
precis: ELECTRONIC FILING AND PROVISION OF INFORMATION (GST/HST) REGULATIONS to properly capture certain Goods and Services Tax/Harmonized Sales Tax (GST/HST) information required for the proper allocation of HST revenues among the federal government and the participating provinces that entered into a modernized Comprehensive Integrated Tax Co-ordination Agreement (CITCA) with Canada.
